Liono: ::helps tocar back to base:: ::Looks at all the maximals:: I'm 
very....... Proud of all of you even though we lost I never Been proud to 
call myself a maximal and as Promised All you have 24 hours of R n R when 
that's is over I'll show all my new  System I'm working on.  ::Staggers a 
Leaves a trail of pink energy leaking From his wounds:: 

Tigerhawk: Where are you going? 

Liono: I have one more Promise to keep also since you never want to rest 
start fixing the ship tiger.

Tigerhawk: Its Key isn't it 
Liono: ::Beastmode Grabs some wild flowers:: Its a promise ::walks towards 
key Direction::
